name: Engage
summary:
Engage is a first person shooter made in flash.
You were engaged for combat missions in a research operation on the island full of huge flying creatures.
Enter a free-fire zone where anything that moves is a legit target. Invading insects descending from the skies? Blast them to bits! Upgrade your weapon set to stay one step ahead of your six-legged enemeies!
